trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted" /> event of <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento <see cref="E:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted" /> de <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs> to obtain information about a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application after the deployment and application manifests have been downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs> para obter informações sobre um [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] após tem sido baixados os manifestos de aplicativo e implantação de aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> to install a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application programmatically on a client machine.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como usar <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> para instalar um [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicativo programaticamente em um computador cliente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the context for the current [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o contexto do aplicativo [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] atual.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ActivationContext" /> object representing the context for the current application.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ActivationContext" /> objeto que representa o contexto para o aplicativo atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets a description of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma descrição do aplicativo [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ApplicationIdentity" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.ApplicationIdentity" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application manifest for this deployment.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o manifesto do aplicativo [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] para essa implantação.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> representing the application manifest.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> que representa o manifesto do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: You can use this variable to grab any information you need from the application manifest, such as a list of dependencies, trust information, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa variável para capturar informações que você precisa do manifesto de aplicativo, como uma lista de dependências, informações de confiança e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the structure of this document, see [ClickOnce Application Manifest](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29570cec-4e53-4660-a850-abc4fa150243).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a estrutura deste documento, consulte [manifesto do aplicativo ClickOnce](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29570cec-4e53-4660-a850-abc4fa150243).

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to examine an application manifest from within a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted> event handler to determine whether the application requires full trust by default.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como examinar um manifesto de aplicativo de dentro um <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted> manipulador de eventos para determinar se o aplicativo requer confiança total por padrão.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment manifest for this deployment.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o manifesto de implantação [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] para essa implantação.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> representing the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> que representa o manifesto de implantação.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application is cached.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se este aplicativo [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] está armazenado em cache.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the application is cached; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o aplicativo é armazenado em cache; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] error log.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o local do log de erros [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the location of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] error log.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém o local de [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] log de erros.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do aplicativo [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the product name of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, as stored in the assembly metadata of the application's main executable file.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o nome do produto do [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicativo, conforme armazenado nos metadados do assembly de arquivo executável principal do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string identifying the subscription.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres que identifica a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: A string with information identifying the subscription.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres com informações que identificam a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of a Web page users can visit to obtain product support for the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o local de uma página da Web que usuários podem visitar para obter suporte de produto para o aplicativo [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> containing the value found in the <c>supportUrl</c> attribute of the deployment manifest's <c><description></c> tag.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> que contém o valor encontrado no <c>supportUrl</c> atributos do manifesto de implantação <c> <descrição> </c> marca.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ClickOnce Deployment Manifest](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8457e615-e3b6-4990-8dcf-11bc590e4e9b).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [manifesto de implantação do ClickOnce](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8457e615-e3b6-4990-8dcf-11bc590e4e9b).

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the update for the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a versão da atualização para o aplicativo [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Version" /> representing the version number contained within the downloaded manifest.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Version" /> que representa o número de versão contido no manifesto baixado.
